verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>. LORD <S%H3068><s%>, I cry <S%H7121><s%> unto thee: make haste <S%H2363><s%> unto me; give ear <S%H238><s%> unto my voice <S%H6963><s%>, when I cry <S%H7121><s%> unto thee.

Let my prayer <S%H8605><s%> be set forth <S%H3559><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee as incense <S%H7004><s%>; and the lifting up <S%H4864><s%> of my hands <S%H3709><s%> as the evening <S%H6153><s%> sacrifice <S%H4503><s%>.
Set <S%H7896><s%> a watch <S%H8108><s%>, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, before my mouth <S%H6310><s%>; keep <S%H5341><s%> the door <S%H1817><s%> of my lips <S%H8193><s%>.

Incline <S%H5186><s%> not my heart <S%H3820><s%> to any evil <S%H7451><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%>, to practise <S%H5953><s%> wicked <S%H7562><s%> works <S%H5949><s%> with men <S%H376><s%> that work <S%H6466><s%> iniquity <S%H205><s%>: and let me not eat <S%H3898><s%> of their dainties <S%H4516><s%>.

Let the righteous <S%H6662><s%> smite <S%H1986><s%> me; it shall be a kindness <S%H2617><s%>: and let him reprove <S%H3198><s%> me; it shall be an excellent <S%H7218><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, which shall not break <S%H5106><s%> my head <S%H7218><s%>: for yet my prayer <S%H8605><s%> also shall be in their calamities <S%H7451><s%>.
When their judges <S%H8199><s%> are overthrown <S%H8058><s%> in stony <S%H5553><s%> places <S%H3027><s%>, they shall hear <S%H8085><s%> my words <S%H561><s%>; for they are sweet <S%H5276><s%>.
Our bones <S%H6106><s%> are scattered <S%H6340><s%> at the grave's <S%H7585><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%>, as when one cutteth <S%H6398><s%> and cleaveth <S%H1234><s%> wood upon the earth <S%H776><s%>.
But mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> are unto thee, O GOD <S%H3069><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%>: in thee is my trust <S%H2620><s%>; leave <S%H6168><s%> not my soul <S%H5315><s%> destitute <S%H6168><s%>.
Keep <S%H8104><s%> me from the snares <S%H3027><s%> <S%H6341><s%> which they have laid <S%H3369><s%> for me, and the gins <S%H4170><s%> of the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%>.
Let the wicked <S%H7563><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> into their own nets <S%H4364><s%>, whilst that I withal <S%H3162><s%> escape <S%H5674><s%>.
